channel.title: Json on My little software warehouse
channel.description: Recent content in Json on My little software warehouse

item.title: PostmanLib - Android and Rest Web Services
item.description: Edit 2013-03-10: I've performed a substancial refactoring of postmanlib, and the details can be found in this new post With the development of MyDearSanta app, I needed to fetch and put some data to a rest service developed using django python framework with a simple set of json based rest apis. The development of the interaction between android and the rest web service was a bit messy because I was in hurry to release the app before Christmas (giving it's xmas related nature), but while developing it I thought it could have been a good start for my first android library.
